1.text: Pick a skein of double-knit yarn and a size G (4 mm) crochet hook.

2.text: Make 10 chain stitches on your hook.

3.text: Slip stitch into the first chain you made to join the ends.

4.text: Chain 3 and double crochet (dc) into each stitch around the circle.

5.text: Join the round and make 4 chain stitches.

6.text: Double crochet and chain 1 into every stitch of the next round.

7.text: Slip stitch to join and make 10 chain stitches.

9.text: Chain 6 and treble crochet into the following stitch.

10.text: Join the round, chain 1, and single crochet (sc) into it.

11.text: Chain 3 and double crochet into the following space.

12.text: Chain 2 and double crochet into the same gap.

13.text: Slip stitch to join the ruffle and single crochet 1.

14.text: Continue to chain and double crochet around the circle.

15.text: Cut the working yarn and weave in the tail.
